-spec minimum_cost(Nums :: [integer()]) -> integer().
minimum_cost(Nums) ->
    Min = lists:min(Nums),
    Max = lists:max(Nums),
    find_min_cost(Nums, Min, Max, Max - Min).

find_min_cost(_, Min, Max, Best) when Min > Max -> Best;
find_min_cost(Nums, Min, Max, Best) ->
    Mid = (Min + Max) div 2,
    CostLeft = calculate_cost(Nums, Mid),
    CostRight = calculate_cost(Nums, Mid + 1),
    NewBest = min(Best, min(CostLeft, CostRight)),
    case CostLeft < CostRight of
        true -> find_min_cost(Nums, Min, Mid - 1, NewBest);
        false -> find_min_cost(Nums, Mid + 1, Max, NewBest)
    end.

calculate_cost(Nums, X) ->
    lists:foldl(fun(Num, Acc) -> Acc + abs(Num - X) end, 0, Nums).
